data.eml:eml: Lectotype designations and nomenclatural changes in Xylographus Mellie (Coleoptera, Ciidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sandoval-Gomez, Vivian Eliana, Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano, Lawrence, John F. (2014): Lectotype designations and nomenclatural changes in Xylographus Mellie (Coleoptera, Ciidae). ZooKeys 374: 23-43, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.374.6553, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.374.6553
